fertilizer means any substance containing one or more
recognized plant nutrients which is used for its
plent nutrient and which is designed for use, or
claimed to have value, in promoting plant growth
but does not include unmanipuleted animal and
vegetable manures ;
formaulate in relation to fertilizer means any blending
or mixing of different ingredients of fertilizers;
and -
formulator means any person enifaged in formulating
~ fertilizer.
